member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.FLASH
member.summary: A FLASH module for Microsoft .NET Gadgeteer

Chip Details:
64 total blocks
1024 sectors
4Kb for each sector
1024 sectrors * 4kb = 4096Kb total memory
256 bytes mamximum for each transfer
